r.d: With Parle, it is possible to implement lexing and parsing in PHP while relying on features and principles of the parser/lexer generator tools for C/C++.
r.n: - Update the bundled parsertl/lexertl libraries (Ben Hanson) - If the grammar ambiquity is detected, parser will now throw an exception - Configure option --enable-parle-utf32 can be passed during pecl install (Michele Locati) - Implemented Parser::sigilCount() (Ben Hanson) - Implement Parser::sigilName() (Ben Hanson)
